title: System 6: a fragile nest
creator_credit: CSIRO, Environmental Protection Authority, W A, ABC-TV (Australia), Craig Collie, Michael Daley and Jeni Kendell
brief_description: System 6 is the name given by the Environmental Protection Agency to the area around Perth. It includes the Darling Ranges and the Swan River System. The detrimental effect of the urban sprawl and industrialisation in the karri forests, on sand dunes, and under the sea, is examined. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
